statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
Given a permutation P of 1 to N, YY wants to know whether there exists such three elements P[i1], P[i2], P[i3] that
P[i1]-P[i2]=P[i2]-P[i3], 1<=i1<i2<i3<=N.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line is T(T<=60), representing the total test cases.
Each test case comes two lines, the former one is N, 3<=N<=10000, the latter is a permutation of 1 to N.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, just output 'Y' if such i<sub>1</sub>, i<sub>2</sub>, i<sub>3</sub> can be found, else 'N'.

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2011 Multi-University Training Contest 1 - Host by HNU
